Name: Calligraphy Hairpin
Desc: A hairpin designed with letters. The string of letters itself has no meaning, but the design is somehow exciting.

Name: Traffic Safety Amulet
Desc: An amulet made to promote traffic safety. When you shake it, you can hear something metal rattling inside.

Name: Heat Pack
Desc: A palm-sized heat pack that radiates warmth when you rub it a few times and shake it. There is no amulet more useful than this in a frigid environment.

Name: Peroro Feather
Desc: An amulet made with large, white feathers. The source of the feathers is one of Momo Friends' most important trade secrets.

Name: Cross
Desc: A cross-shaped amulet favored by Trinity students. It also works well as an accessory to hang on a bag.

Name: Camo Daruma
Desc: A camo-patterned Daruma plush. Blends in perfectly with all surroundings.

Name: Voodoo Doll
Desc: A cursed doll that seems to be filled with strong emotions such as grudges. It seems to be easy to use as a needlestick, and is very popular among the students of the handicraft club.

Name: Waterproof Digital Watch
Desc: A digital watch produced by the sportswear brand Serval. Because it's waterproof, there is no need to fear ruining it, even if you wear it while swimming.

Name: Leather Wristwatch
Desc: A leather wristwatch made by the outdoor brand Manaslu. A warm lining prevents your wrist from getting cold.

Name: Wavecat Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch featuring Wavecat, the cat character from Momo Friends. Wavecat's arms, which act as the clock hands, are twisted in a bizarre way.

Name: Antique Pocket Watch
Desc: An antique pocket watch with the Veronica logo engraved on it. It's far less convenient to check the time with than a wristwatch, but remains popular as a fashion item.

Name: Dustproof Leather Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch from the military specialty brand Kazeyama. Its enhanced resistance to dust means you don't have to worry about it breaking down in harsh environments.

Name: Gothic Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch designed in a gothic style. Although it looks good with classical clothes, it's difficult to read the time from if you are not accustomed to it.

Name: Bluetooth Necklace
Desc: A Bluetooth necklace that can measure the wearer's body temperature and heart rate. Because it can easily and accurately measure the rate of exercise, it's popular with those who are trying to lose weight.

Name: Snowflake Pendant
Desc: A silver pendant with a snowflake ornament on it. If you stare at the snowflake decoration for a long time, you'll start to feel a bit chilly.

Name: Nicholai Locket
Desc: A locket bearing the face of Mr. Nicholai, a character from Momo Friends. A small space for storing photos opens when you press on his nose.

Name: Cross Choker
Desc: A choker with a cross from the luxury brand Veronica. It's popular for its simple yet sophisticated style.

Name: Dog Tag
Desc: A dog tag inscribed with the name and class year of the student wearing it. It has recently gained popularity as an accessory among high school girls.

Name: Punk Choker
Desc: A punk-style choker with sharp spikes. Wearing it around your neck makes it a little harder to nod your head.
